All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AboutController
Controller class responsible for showing general info about the game.
Board
Represents the entire game board, containing several pieces
DeleteFilesInFolder
Controller class responsible for deleting all the files in a folder.
KlotskiApp
 
LicenseController
Controller class responsible for showing the Licence.
Main
 
MovePieceController
Controller class responsible for the moving piece operation.
NextBestMove
Controller class responsible for managing the next best move operation.
OpenController
Controller class responsible for opening a save file and reloading the game.
Piece
a class that represents a single klotski piece
PuzzleView
 
QuitController
Controller class responsible for managing the closing of the application.
ResetPuzzleController
Controller class responsible for the resetting of the board to the initial configuration.
SaveController
Controller class responsible for creating the savefile.
SelectPieceController
Controller class responsible for piece selection.
SetConfigController
Controller class responsible for setting the chosen configuration.
TimerController
Controller class responsible for controlling the timer.
TmpSaveController
Class responsible for creating the temporary file used by the UndoController.
UndoMoveController
Controller class responsible for undoing the last move in the game.
